incidents.name: Errors When Purchasing Numbers in the Console

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing 5XX errors when trying to purchase phone numbers over the API in the Console. This incident has been resolved.

The API with 5XX errors in the Console when trying to purchase phone numbers over for a subset of customers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue phone number purchases in the Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on ~9.5% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: Active data sessions on Super SIM has been resolved and it is operating normally at this time.

We are seeing recovery on active data sessions on Super SIM. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are seeing recovery on active data sessions on Super SIM. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 3:05 AM UTC, we observed ~9.5% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working on identifying and resolving the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Unable to Get Conference Meta-Data From APIs

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conferences was degraded for 15 minutes between 10:09 am - 10:24 am Pacific Time on 11/04/2024. During this period of time, customers were unable to get Conference meta-data from the APIs.  The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Twilio Conferences. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
